title: Israel-Hamas War: Israel Vows It Is Prepared for Retaliatory Attacks
content: As a response from Iran and Hezbollah to twin assassinations last week looms, Netanyahu tells soldiers that Israel is ready for “defense, as well as offense.”
summary: As a response from Iran and Hezbollah to twin assassinations last week looms, Netanyahu tells soldiers that Israel is ready for “defense, as well as offense.”

title: Arab and Western Nations Urge Restraint as Israel-Iran Tensions Simmer

title: How Anti-Immigrant Riots Flared in the U.K.

title: Chinese Woman Loses Legal Challenge for Right to Freeze Her Eggs

title: Russian Official in Kursk Declares State of Emergency as Ukraine Advances
